title: Calories in a Glazed Donut
meta_description: Discover calories in a glazed donut, including carbs, fat, protein, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with quick tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Standard yeast-raised glazed donut (~60 g), bakery-style with sugar glaze, no fillings or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, recipe, and preparation method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard glazed donut provides ~252 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a glazed donut from Krispy Kreme?
faqs.a: About 190-250 kcal depending on size; standard is ~252 kcal.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a glazed donut?
faqs.a: Roughly 28 g carbs, including 15 g sugars and 0.8 g fiber per donut.

faqs.q: Is a glazed donut high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, ~14 g total fat with 3.5 g saturated per serving.

faqs.q: How much protein in a glazed donut?
faqs.a: Only about 3.4 g protein, making it low in this nutrient.

faqs.q: Do glazed donuts have trans fats?
faqs.a: Minimal, around 0.1 g per donut in most commercial varieties.
